This would help to maintain the health of the planet and provide nutritious food for all.

Create a global health system: To ensure that everyone has access to quality healthcare, I would establish a global health system that provides affordable and accessible healthcare to all people, regardless of their location or socioeconomic status.

This would involve working with governments, NGOs, and other organizations to develop and implement solutions that benefit everyone.
